gw.locale

Class LanguagesTestTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.locale.LanguagesTestTransformer

  • public class LanguagesTestTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
    Test utility that can be used to replace the Languages dependency in V3 smoke tests or other V3 Gosu tests. Uses the standard languages implementation but also allows the test to provide a "transformer" which can transform any of the display keys returned by the normal implementation.

    Tests should usually call setup(DisplayKeyTransformer) in their beforeClass method and tearDown() in their afterClass. Failure to call tearDown() will leave the transformer in place which may affect subsequent tests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  LanguagesTestTransformer.DisplayKeyTransformer
      Simple strategy object, normally implemented by a Gosu block or Java lambda, that is called before returning any localized string.

    • Constructor Summary

      LanguagesTestTransformer() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void setup(LanguagesTestTransformer.DisplayKeyTransformer transformer)
      Replace the standard languages implementation with a test double that delegates to the original.
      static void tearDown()
      Revert to the standard languages implementation.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LanguagesTestTransformer

        public LanguagesTestTransformer()

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public static void setup(LanguagesTestTransformer.DisplayKeyTransformer transformer)
        Replace the standard languages implementation with a test double that delegates to the original. The given transformer is called on every localized string returned by the original
        Parameters:
        transformer - called on every display key lookup, can transform the value of the localized string returned by the standard implementation

      • tearDown

        public static void tearDown()
        Revert to the standard languages implementation. This operation is a no-op if the test double was never set up in the first place.
